verses.verse: A Song; a Psalm of the sons of Korah. Great <S%H1419><s%> is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised <S%H1984><s%>, In the city <S%H5892><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>, in his holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>.

Beautiful <S%H3303><s%> in elevation <S%H5131><s%>, the joy <S%H4885><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>, Is mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, on the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, The city <S%H7151><s%> of the great <S%H7227><s%> King <S%H4428><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> hath made himself known <S%H3045><s%> in her palaces <S%H759><s%> for a refuge <S%H4869><s%>.
For <S%H4428><s%>, lo, the kings assembled <S%H3259><s%> themselves <S%H5674><s%>, They passed by together <S%H3162><s%>.
They saw <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H8539><s%>, then were they amazed; They were dismayed <S%H926><s%>, they hasted away <S%H2648><s%>.
Trembling <S%H7461><s%> took hold <S%H270><s%> of them there <S%H2427><s%>, Pain, as of a woman in travail <S%H2427><s%>.
With the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> Thou breakest <S%H7665><s%> the ships <S%H591><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%>.

As we have heard <S%H8085><s%>, so have we seen <S%H7200><s%> In the city <S%H5892><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, in the city <S%H5892><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>: God <S%H430><s%> will establish <S%H3559><s%> it for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
We have thought <S%H1819><s%> on thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, In the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thy temple <S%H1964><s%>.

As is thy name <S%H8034><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, So is thy praise <S%H8416><s%> unto the ends <S%H7099><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: Thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%>.
Let mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> be glad <S%H1523><s%>, Let the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> rejoice <S%H1523><s%>, Because of thy judgments <S%H4941><s%>.
Walk about <S%H5437><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and go round about <S%H5362><s%> her <S%H5608><s%>; Number the towers thereof <S%H4026><s%>;

480 <S%H7896><s%> ye well <S%H3820><s%> her bulwarks <S%H2430><s%>; Consider <S%H6448><s%> her palaces <S%H759><s%>: That ye may tell <S%H5608><s%> it to the generation <S%H1755><s%> following <S%H314><s%>.
For this God <S%H430><s%> is our God <S%H430><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>: He will be our guide <S%H5090><s%> even unto death <S%H4192><s%>.
